Headline: #67 67th-69th-71st Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 69th/Hamilton
ShortDescription: Eastbound 67 67th-69th-71st  buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, 67th, Damen and 69th: due to, street blockage near 69th/Hamilton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #67 67th-69th-71st  buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, 67th, Damen and 69th: due to, street blockage near 69th/Hamilton.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #53A South Pulaski and #79 79th Temporary Reroute near 79th/Pulaski
ShortDescription: 53A South Pulaski and 79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 79th/Pulaski due to, street blockage near 79th/Pulaski.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#53A South Pulaski and #79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 79th/Pulaski due to, street blockage near 79th/Pulaski.

Northbound #53A South Pulaski buses will operate via Pulaski, 79th, Columbus, Kedzie, 71st, Pulaski and over regular route.

Westbound #79 79th buses will operate via 79th, Kedzie, 71st, Pulaski, 79th and over regular route

Allow extra travel time.
